version_description: We're constantly working to improve the Rocket Mortgage app. This release we're fixing some bugs for a better experience.
We're constantly working to improve the Rocket Mortgage app. This release we're fixing some bugs for a better experience.
Now you can easily upload any documents you need to send to us, and you can start a new loan for a refinance or second property right in the app.
Now you can easily upload any documents you need to send to us, and you can start a new loan for a refinance or second property right in the app.

Now see due dates on your to do items so you can stay on schedule to close your loan.
Now see due dates on your to do items so you can stay on schedule to close your loan.
Now you can use Rocket Mortgage on your Apple watch to make your one-time mortgage payment. We’ve also enhanced our camera and fixed a handful of bugs.

Now you can close your loan faster when you use our income search tool to securely share your financial info with us.
Now you can close your loan faster when you use our income search tool to securely share your financial info with us.
Now you can set up biweekly payments so you pay your mortgage your way. And if you’re in the process of getting your loan, we’ll send you a push notification when your approval letter is ready.

Now when you take a picture to upload your documents, our camera will detect the edges and text to help you get the clearest image.

We’ve added Refer a Friend, so you can invite friends and family to easily download the app.

We're constantly working to improve the Rocket Mortgage app. This release we're enhancing some existing features for a better mortgage experience.

This release we've added the ability to get urgent information to you faster by incorporating alerts right into the sign-on page.
This release we've added the ability to get urgent information to you faster by incorporating alerts right into the sign-on page.

We're taking a break from Apple Watch and removing the Rocket Mortgage Wear app. This will help us to fix some technical issues we've encountered with the Watch OS. We're sorry you won't be able to use it on your Apple Watch for now, but we're still committed to giving you the best online mortgage experience. You can continue to enjoy Rocket Mortgage on your iOS phone or tablet.

We're taking a break from Apple Watch and removing the Rocket Mortgage Wear app. This will help us to fix some technical issues we've encountered with the Watch OS. We're sorry you won't be able to use it on your Apple Watch for now, but we're still committed to giving you the best online mortgage experience. You can continue to enjoy Rocket Mortgage on your iOS phone or tablet.
We've launched a new feature that makes it easier for you to manage multiple loans you've got in progress. And, we fixed a couple of bugs too – for a better online mortgage experience.

For our servicing clients: We want to make sure you have the numbers you need to file taxes. So we made some feature updates that will allow you to easily access your 1098 forms for 2018 when they become available.

Make an offer on a home faster while on the go. We’ve added a feature allowing you to edit your approval letter amount right in the app.

Rocket Mortgage has a new look! We've given the app a makeover to make it more polished and even easier to navigate. It is a shade bolder, and we've kept the same great features that you're used to.

• We squashed some bugs and improved some things, including a fix for frequent camera crashes.
• Navigation’s now a little easier with the addition of a small design accent in screen tabs.

If you're in the process of getting a loan, you can now easily upload stuff directly to any of your to-do items. Even to-do items that you've completed. This simplifies things when we need additional documents from you.

We've made an enhancement to better understand how you like to use our app. If we ask you what you think of it, be sure to tell us! It'll help us improve your Rocket Mortgage experience.

Pay your mortgage your way. Now you can set up autopay in the month that your payments are due. Also in this release, we're temporarily removing the Escrow screen while we update it to make it better.

The balances for Principal and Escrow have been added to the Transaction History page. An alert was added to confirm your intent of adding additional Principal and/or Escrow to your One-time payment.

In this release we polished a few screens to give you more clarity about how to use some existing features. Always keeping things simple!

If you already have a mortgage with us: The Escrow screen is back. We temporarily removed it in a previous version of the app to make it better. And now it is!

If you already have a loan, now you can get an estimate of your payoff amount right in the app.

If you're in the process of getting a loan, we've added a feature that allows you to search for a real estate agent.
You can now opt for electronic statements and 1098 documents using the app. If you already have a loan with us, just tap on Enroll In Paperless from the Payment Center screen.

Welcome to the improved Rocket Mortgage! The app has a fresh new look that'll help make your mortgage journey seamless. And, some performance enhancements to boost speed and ease of use.

We’re always looking to improve your experience! If you have autopay set up, you can now split your monthly mortgage payment between two bank accounts.
We’re always looking to improve your experience! If you have autopay set up, you can now split your monthly mortgage payment between two bank accounts.

- If you’re in the process of getting a mortgage: You can now view a breakdown of all your mortgage numbers on the Loan Info screen.

- If you’re paying on a mortgage: You can now estimate your monthly payments and determine how much will go toward your principal and interest with our new Amortization Calculator.

- We also added a feature that allows you to access any loans you’ve paid off so that you’re able to get tax information or other documents you might need from them.

Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes

You can now schedule your closing appointment through the mobile app! Once we’re ready for you to close you’ll choose your closing location, date, time, and even how to give or receive closing funds. And we’ve also squashed a bug or two to keep our Rocket Mortgage experience running smoothly.

You can now schedule your closing appointment through the mobile app! Once we’re ready for you to close you’ll choose your closing location, date, time, and even how to give or receive closing funds. And we’ve also squashed a bug or two to keep our Rocket Mortgage experience running smoothly.

We squashed some bugs and improved some things to make the app better. Also, Rocket Mortgage now supports Dark Mode! Once you've updated to iOS 13, go to Settings in the app and switch the display appearance to Dark to check it out.

We squashed some bugs and improved some things to make the app better. Also, Rocket Mortgage now supports Dark Mode! Once you've updated to iOS 13, go to Settings in the app and switch the display appearance to Dark to check it out.

We made some usability enhancements to our app to make your mobile mortgage experience easier and more pleasurable. We consolidated the payment flow to help you quickly understand your finances. We made My Documents more intuitive by organizing into categories for easier access in the mortgage process. We also improved the Uniform Residential Loan Application with a new e-sign process.

Lastly, to keep things running smoothly, we fixed a few bugs along the way.
